overview: On Saturday, May 28, Fury Pro Grappling will return to action with its fourth-ever submission-only event. The card is headlined by a match-up between current UFC welterweight contender Sean Brady and longtime UFC and Bellator MMA veteran Ben Saunders. The event also features a number of top submission grappling competitors, including ADCC qualifier Jacob Rodriguez, ADCC veteran Jason Rau, and Medusa jiu-jitsu champion Sophia Cassella.
title: Fury Pro Grappling 4
